description: England hooker Connie Powell signs a new "multi-year" contract with Harlequins.
title: Connie Powell: England hooker signs new Harlequins contract
title_page: Connie Powell: England hooker signs new Harlequins contract - BBC Sport
maintext:
England hooker Connie Powell has signed a new "multi-year" contract with Harlequins.
The 24-year-old, who has 19 international caps, has helped England win three Six Nations titles and reach the final of the 2021 World Cup (held in 2022).
Harlequins are currently second in the Premiership Women's Rugby table, three points behind Powell's former club Gloucester-Hartpury, but with a game in hand.
Powell has made nine appearances for Quins this season, scoring 35 points.
She moved to the Twickenham-based club from Gloucester-Hartpury at the beginning of the 2023-24 season.
